title: Screen turns black after champ select
body: Hey, it just started today and I'm wondering if it maybe is related to the fact that I just upgraded to windows 10 from windows 7 but anyway. Everything works perfectly fine in the client but after champ select, the loading screen never fully loads and doesn't show the portraits for any champs. If I alt-tab and then go back then it will show all of the champions on the loading screen for a second and then the screen goes black. Eventually it will get in game and the same thing happens. If I go to LOL tab it shows the game screen for a second and I can move or do something real quickly but then the screen goes black and nothing I do affects the game. Any idea? I have tried to update videos drivers, I've reinstalled league, and many other things but nothing has helped!

replies.body: This black screen usually indicates a network issue failing to connect to the server and download assets.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for some troubleshooting steps to fix this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Try to minimize the screen Alt+Enter.
